name: Deli Lovers' Paradise
description: A meat lover’s dream come true! Freshly sliced roast beef, smoked turkey, corned beef, Black Forest ham and cooked chicken are accented with olives and cherry tomatoes.

name: Cheese Pleasers
description: Is your gathering calling out for 'cheese, please'? This platter has a slice of happiness for everyone. Indulge your guests with a selection of havarti, cheddar and edam cheeses.

name: Savoury Delights
description: A true crowd pleaser, this meat and cheese selection has something for everyone. Specially selected roast beef, Black Forest ham and smoked chicken are paired beautifully with Havarti and marble or mild cheddar cheese.

name: Fruit Celebration
description: A seasonal selection of premium fresh fruits that'll sweeten any gathering.

name: Cookie Craze
description: Any cookie monsters in your crowd? These freshly made cookies are mouthwatering and will disappear in no time!

name: Sweet Surprises
description: A little touch of sweetness will go far for any type of occasion. Tempt your guests with our selection of fresh pastries.

name: Veggies & Dip
description: A healthy and delicious option that makes a colourful centrepiece. We pile on the fresh veggies and add a flavour dip. We recommend Classic Ranch.

name: Party Perfect Sandwiches
description: A feast for your senses! Specially selected roast beef, Black Forest ham, and smoked chicken are paired with the finest havarti and marble/mild cheddar.

name: Gourmet Submarines
description: Serve up our hearty subs filled with freshly sliced turkey, Black Forest ham and havarti cheese.

name: Pita Perfect
description: Our fresh pita pockets are available in your choice of white or whole wheats. Get them stuffed with tuna or egg salad. It's delicious food for thought for you next lunch meeting.

name: Party Pinwheels
description: A meat lover’s dream come true! Freshly sliced roast beef, smoked turkey, corned beef, Black Forest ham and cooked chicken are accented with olives and cherry tomatoes.

name: European Flavour
description: Old world meets new with this selection of traditional European flavours. Your guests will devour this mouth-watering selection of Genoa salami, capicola, sopressata, cacciatore, mortadella and prosciutto.

name: Antipasto Perfecto
description: All your favourite Mediterranean flavours are here. Your guests will delight over Genoa salami, sopressata and imported cheeses, plus cherry bocconcini, roasted red peppers and assorted olives. It's all perfectly arranged to create a feast for the eyes!

name: Mediterranean Mix
description: A colourful mix of Mediterranean-inspired flavours are served in this healthy platter of roasted red peppers, mixed olives, pita triangles and, of course, hummus dip.

name: Grilled Veggie Medley
description: Hello sunshine! Add a touch of summer with this gourmet spread of perfectly grilled eggplant, zucchini, roasted red peppers, asparagus and mushrooms. It's all lightly dressed for an extra hit of flavour.

name: Olive the Best
description: Explore the flavours of olives from around the globe. Discover spiced green, jumbo pitted, pimento stuff, dry-cured and kalamata olives. A tasty way to complement your menu.

name: Seafood Medley
description: Seafood lovers will be in heaven with this delectable assortment. Smoked salmon is surrounded by fresh black tiger shrimps and delicious crab sticks.

name: Bagel Delight
description: Good mornings are made great by our freshly baked assortment of New York style bagels. Spread the love of a creamy cheese, and start the day deliciously.

name: Rise & Shine!
description: Bring in a delectable selection of freshly baked muffins, melt-in-your-mouth croissants and yummy danishes. This platter contains the secret ingredients to happier morning meetings.

name: Shrimp 'n' Dip
description: It's never a party until this shrimp cocktail platter shows up. Your guests will love dipping our freshly cooked black tiger shrimp into the tangy seafood cocktail sauce.

name: Jumbo Wings & Dip
description: These juicy wings, with a classic Blue Cheese dip, are the MVP of every game night. Choose your style of spice: mild, medium or hot. If you’re game, try another dip flavour: Roasted Red, Pepper, Artichoke & Asiago or Avocado Hummus.

name: Fresh Spinach Dip
description: Put the fun into eating your greens by serving up this classic favourite – Spinach and Pumpernickel dip.

name: Cakes for All Occasions
description: A sweet way to mark your special event, our freshly baked cakes are made with the finest ingredients. With so many flavours and designs to choose from, it's easy to find the perfect cake for the occasion.

name: Fresh Gift Idea
description: The Highland Farm Gift Card is the perfect gift for any occasion. Pick one up at the checkout on your next visit.

name: Gift Giving Made Easy
description: Give a gift that overflows with kindheartedness. Our gift and fruit baskets are designed to be thoughtful, personal and unforgettable and are filled with only the highest quality items and gourmet treats. We also offer Country Kitchen gift baskets and custom-made baskets. Visit our store for details.

name: Blooming with Ideas
description: Make your celebration extra special with our freshly picked, pre-arranged bouquets, or brighten up your home or office with a potted plant. Custom floral arrangements are also available exclusively at our Mississauga store.

name: Mini Samosas & Dip
description: Savour our potato-filled samosas with your choice of dip: Chunky Blue Cheese, Roasted Red Pepper, Avocado Hummus or our favourite, Artichoke & Asiago.

name: Mini Empanadas & Dip
description: Our Latin-American style turnovers, stuffed with chicken, beef or spinach & feta, are perfect with our dips: Chunky Blue Cheese, Roasted Red Pepper, Artichoke & Asiago or our recommended flavour, Avocado Hummus.

name: Perogies & Dip
description: Golden brown and crispy on the outside, each perogi is stuffed with potato and cheese goodness. Serve it with your favourite dip: Chunky Blue Cheese, Roasted Red Pepper, Artichoke & Asiago or Avocado Hummus.

name: Flavours of the World
description: Travel the globe with our international-inspired cheese platter, featuring grana padano, beemster, auricchio and manchego.

name: Flavours of Italy
description: Feast on a traditional platter of Italian cold cuts, Genoa salami, pancetta, parma prosciutto, culatello, auricchio, dry olives and dry figs.

name: Flavours of Spain
description: Take your guests on a Spanish flavour adventure. Enjoy our platter of manchego cheese, serrano ham, chorizo sausage, almond stuffed olives, grilled eggplant and stuffed cherry peppers

name: Flavours of Paris
description: A unique and delicious assortment of French And local cheeses, including double crème brie, chèvre noir and sauvagine.

name: Deli Delight
description: Enjoy a selection of your favourite deli sandwiches on rye bread and filled with smoked meats. Of course, it wouldn’t be complete without a side of pickles!
